languages.text: "Никто ни в кого не влезает и никуда не расходится! Твой брат за свои таланты получил лучшее назначение и, возможно, сам решил с тобой больше не иметь дел!" {n}Голос дворянина срывается, он едва сдерживает слезы.{/n} "Хоть сейчас, Звездн{mf|ый|ая} Госпо{mf|дин|жа}, отправьте слуг домой к модисту и найдете его живым и здоровым!"

"Skin suits and splitting seams? Preposterous! Your brother was rewarded for his talents with the best assignment he could hope for — maybe he just decided he wanted nothing to do with you anymore!" {n}The nobleman's voice cracks: he is on the verge of tears.{/n} "Your Celestial Highness, if such were your will, you could send servants to the dressmaker this very moment and find this man's brother alive and well!"
languages.original_text: "Никто ни в кого не влезает и никуда не расходится! Твой брат за свои таланты получил лучшее назначение и, возможно, сам решил с тобой больше не иметь дел!" {n}Голос дворянина срывается, он едва сдерживает слезы.{/n} "Хоть сейчас, Звездн{mf|ый|ая} Госпо{mf|дин|жа}, отправьте слуг домой к модисту и найдете его живым и здоровым!"

traits.locale_text: "Skin suits and splitting seams? Preposterous! Your brother was rewarded for his talents with the best assignment he could hope for — he might have wanted nothing to do with you anymore!" {n}The nobleman's voice cracks — he is on the verge of tears.{/n} "Your Celestial Highness, if such were your will, you could send servants to the dressmaker this very moment and find his brother alive and well!"

"Skin suits and splitting seams? Preposterous! Your brother was rewarded for his talents with the best assignment he could hope for — maybe he just decided he wanted nothing to do with you anymore!" {n}The nobleman's voice cracks: he is on the verge of tears.{/n} "Your Celestial Highness, if such were your will, you could send servants to the dressmaker this very moment and find this man's brother alive and well!"
"Skin suits and splitting seams? Preposterous! Your brother serves honourably as a valet in the upper city!"

"Skin suits and splitting seams? Preposterous! Your brother was rewarded for his talents with the best assignment he could hope for — maybe he just decided he wanted nothing to do with you anymore!" {n}The nobleman's voice cracks: he is on the verge of tears.{/n} "Your Celestial Highness, if such were your will, you could send servants to the dressmaker this very moment and find this man's brother alive and well!"

Your brother was rewarded for his talents with the best assignment he could hope for — he might have wanted nothing to do with you anymore!" {n}The nobleman's voice cracks — he is on the verge of tears.{/n} "Your Celestial Highness, if such were your will, you could send servants to the dressmaker this very moment and find his brother alive and well!"

"Skin suits and splitting seams? Preposterous! Your brother was rewarded for his talents with the best assignment he could hope for — maybe he just decided he wanted nothing to do with you anymore!" {n}The nobleman's voice cracks: he is on the verge of tears.{/n} "Your Celestial Highness, if such were your will, you could send servants to the dressmaker this very moment and find this man's brother alive and well!"

languages.text: “到处都是裂缝？小两码的皮衣？简直是胡说八道！你弟弟的手艺非常出色，他得到了他梦寐以求的工作！说不定他只是不想再和你扯上任何关系而已！”{n}这个贵族的声音都喊哑了，仿佛要哭出来一样。{/n}“来自上界的大人啊，如果您愿意的话，您现在就可以派人去找那个裁缝！这个人的弟弟明明活得好好的！”
languages.original_text: "Skin suits and splitting seams? Preposterous! Your brother was rewarded for his talents with the best assignment he could hope for — maybe he just decided he wanted nothing to do with you anymore!" {n}The nobleman's voice cracks: he is on the verge of tears.{/n} "Your Celestial Highness, if such were your will, you could send servants to the dressmaker this very moment and find this man's brother alive and well!"

traits.locale_text: “到处都是裂缝？小两码的皮衣？简直是胡说八道！你弟弟的手艺非常出色，他得到了他梦寐以求的工作！说不定他只是不想再和你扯上任何关系而已！”{n}这个贵族的声音都喊哑了，仿佛要哭出来一样。{/n}“来自上界的大人啊，如果您愿意的话，您现在就可以派人去找那个裁缝！这个人的弟弟明明活得好好的！”

languages.text: 「皮の服だの縫い目が裂けるだの…馬鹿げている！君の弟はその才能を認められ、望み得る中で最高の任務を与えられたのだ。もしかすると、君との関わりを断ちたくなっただけかもしれない！」{n}貴族の声がわずかに震えた。彼は今にも涙を流しそうだった。{/n}「天の閣下よ、もしお望みであれば、今すぐにでも召使いを仕立屋へ遣わし、この男の弟が健在であることをお確かめください！」
languages.original_text: "Skin suits and splitting seams? Preposterous! Your brother was rewarded for his talents with the best assignment he could hope for — maybe he just decided he wanted nothing to do with you anymore!" {n}The nobleman's voice cracks: he is on the verge of tears.{/n} "Your Celestial Highness, if such were your will, you could send servants to the dressmaker this very moment and find this man's brother alive and well!"

traits.locale_text: 「皮の服だの縫い目が裂けるだの…馬鹿げている！君の弟はその才能を認められ、望み得る中で最高の任務を与えられたのだ。もしかすると、君との関わりを断ちたくなっただけかもしれない！」{n}貴族の声がわずかに震えた。彼は今にも涙を流しそうだった。{/n}「天の閣下よ、もしお望みであれば、今すぐにでも召使いを仕立屋へ遣わし、この男の弟が健在であることをお確かめください！」

languages.text: «¿Trajes de piel y costuras rotas? ¡Sandeces! ¡Los talentos de su hermano fueron recompensados con la mejor labor a la que podría aspirar... ¡a lo mejor es que ya no quiere saber nada de usted!». {n}La voz del noble se rompe: está a punto de llorar.{/n} «Su Excelencia Celestial, si fuera su voluntad, ¡podría enviar sirvientes a la sastrería ahora mismo y ver que el hermano está perfectamente!».
languages.original_text: "Skin suits and splitting seams? Preposterous! Your brother was rewarded for his talents with the best assignment he could hope for — maybe he just decided he wanted nothing to do with you anymore!" {n}The nobleman's voice cracks: he is on the verge of tears.{/n} "Your Celestial Highness, if such were your will, you could send servants to the dressmaker this very moment and find this man's brother alive and well!"

traits.locale_text: «¿Trajes de piel y costuras rotas? ¡Sandeces! ¡Los talentos de su hermano fueron recompensados con la mejor labor a la que podría aspirar... ¡a lo mejor es que ya no quiere saber nada de usted!». {n}La voz del noble se rompe: está a punto de llorar.{/n} «Su Excelencia Celestial, si fuera su voluntad, ¡podría enviar sirvientes a la sastrería ahora mismo y ver que el hermano está perfectamente!».

languages.text: "Suret mi, deri diktirmek mi? Ne münasebet! Kardeşin, becerileri sayesinde hayal edebileceği en iyi göreve verildi. Belki de artık seninle münasebetini sürdürmek istememeye karar vermiştir!" {n}Soylu adamın titreyen sesi, gözyaşlarına boğulmak üzere olduğunu işaret ediyor.{/n} "Semavi Efendimiz, dilerseniz hemen şimdi hizmetkârlarınızı terzinin yanına gönderebilir ve bu adamın kardeşinin sağ olduğunu tasdik edebilirsiniz!"
languages.original_text: "Skin suits and splitting seams? Preposterous! Your brother was rewarded for his talents with the best assignment he could hope for — maybe he just decided he wanted nothing to do with you anymore!" {n}The nobleman's voice cracks: he is on the verge of tears.{/n} "Your Celestial Highness, if such were your will, you could send servants to the dressmaker this very moment and find this man's brother alive and well!"

traits.locale_text: "Suret mi, deri diktirmek mi? Ne münasebet! Kardeşin, becerileri sayesinde hayal edebileceği en iyi göreve verildi. Belki de artık seninle münasebetini sürdürmek istememeye karar vermiştir!" {n}Soylu adamın titreyen sesi, gözyaşlarına boğulmak üzere olduğunu işaret ediyor.{/n} "Semavi Efendimiz, dilerseniz hemen şimdi hizmetkârlarınızı terzinin yanına gönderebilir ve bu adamın kardeşinin sağ olduğunu tasdik edebilirsiniz!"

languages.text: « Des costumes de peau et des coutures qui craquent ? Ridicule ! Votre frère a été récompensé pour son talent et a reçu un poste d'exception. Peut-être qu'il a simplement décidé qu'il ne voulait plus jamais avoir affaire à vous ! {n}La voix du noble se brise, vous sentez qu'il est sur le point d'éclater en sanglots.{/n} Votre Altesse Célestissime, si vous le désirez, vous pouvez envoyer immédiatement des serviteurs chez le tailleur afin de retrouver le frère de cet homme, qui se porte comme un charme ! »
languages.original_text: "Skin suits and splitting seams? Preposterous! Your brother was rewarded for his talents with the best assignment he could hope for — maybe he just decided he wanted nothing to do with you anymore!" {n}The nobleman's voice cracks: he is on the verge of tears.{/n} "Your Celestial Highness, if such were your will, you could send servants to the dressmaker this very moment and find this man's brother alive and well!"

traits.locale_text: « Des costumes de peau et des coutures qui craquent ? Ridicule ! Votre frère a été récompensé pour son talent et a reçu un poste d'exception. Peut-être qu'il a simplement décidé qu'il ne voulait plus jamais avoir affaire à vous ! {n}La voix du noble se brise, vous sentez qu'il est sur le point d'éclater en sanglots.{/n} Votre Altesse Célestissime, si vous le désirez, vous pouvez envoyer immédiatement des serviteurs chez le tailleur afin de retrouver le frère de cet homme, qui se porte comme un charme ! »

languages.text: "Anzüge aus Haut und geplatzte Nähte? Lächerlich! Euer Bruder wurde für sein Talent mit dem besten Amt belohnt, auf das er hoffen konnte ... vielleicht wollte er ja nur nichts mehr mit Euch zu tun haben!" {n}Die Stimme des Adeligen bricht. Er ist den Tränen nahe.{/n} "Eure himmlische Hoheit, wenn das Euer Wille wäre, könntet Ihr gleich jetzt Diener zum Schneider schicken und den Bruder dieses Mannes bei bester Gesundheit antreffen."
languages.original_text: "Skin suits and splitting seams? Preposterous! Your brother was rewarded for his talents with the best assignment he could hope for — maybe he just decided he wanted nothing to do with you anymore!" {n}The nobleman's voice cracks: he is on the verge of tears.{/n} "Your Celestial Highness, if such were your will, you could send servants to the dressmaker this very moment and find this man's brother alive and well!"

Er ist den Tränen nahe.{/n} "Eure himmlische Hoheit, wenn das Euer Wille wäre, könntet Ihr gleich jetzt Diener zum Schneider schicken und den Bruder dieses Mannes bei bester Gesundheit antreffen."
